Package io.mani.restfullapp.topics

Class TopicController

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.mani.restfullapp.topics.TopicController
  • @RestController
public class TopicController
extends java.lang.Object
    this is our Topic Controller Class with this class we define the returns for each request to specific URL

      TopicController()  

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addTopic​(Topic topic)
      this method post a topic when the post method comes to URL in this case the value is the URL and we post each time a topic to this URL
      void deleteTopic​(java.lang.String id)
      This method delete a topic base on specific given id
      java.util.List<Topic> getAllTopics()
      this method return all topic lists when a get method comes to /topics URL
      java.util.Optional<Topic> getTopic​(java.lang.String id)
      this method return specific topic base on id when a get method comes to /topics/{id} URL in this case id is dynamic and specified by each request.
      void updateTopic​(Topic topic, java.lang.String id)
      this method put a topic when the put method comes to URL that means we can edit each topic based on id

    • Method Detail

      • getAllTopics

        @RequestMapping("/topics")
public java.util.List<Topic> getAllTopics()
        this method return all topic lists when a get method comes to /topics URL
        Returns:
        All Topics in List

      • getTopic

        @RequestMapping("/topics/{id}")
public java.util.Optional<Topic> getTopic​(@PathVariable
                                          java.lang.String id)
        this method return specific topic base on id when a get method comes to /topics/{id} URL in this case id is dynamic and specified by each request.
        Returns:
        All Topics in List

      • addTopic

        @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                value="/topics")
public void addTopic​(@RequestBody
                     Topic topic)
        this method post a topic when the post method comes to URL in this case the value is the URL and we post each time a topic to this URL

      • updateTopic

        @RequestMapping(method=PUT,
                value="/topics/{id}")
public void updateTopic​(@RequestBody
                        Topic topic,
                        @PathVariable
                        java.lang.String id)
        this method put a topic when the put method comes to URL that means we can edit each topic based on id
        Parameters:
        topic - topic
        id - id of each topic

      • deleteTopic

        @RequestMapping(method=DELETE,
                value="/topics/{id}")
public void deleteTopic​(@PathVariable
                        java.lang.String id)
        This method delete a topic base on specific given id
        Parameters:
        id - id to specify which topic must be deleted.
